data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Language::Prolog::Yaswi is an interface to the SWI-Prolog system (
    http://swi-prolog.org/ ).

    As Language::Prolog::SWI is already taken I have to use another
    name and following an ancient tradition in the computer culture I
    opted for Yaswi that stands for Yet Another SWI.

    I think this module will result interesting to others trying to
    insert some bits of logical programing in it's Perl code and as so
    it should be included in the module list.

    Bye,

    - Salvador.
